description:
The Losers discuss Nikolaj Arcel’s film adaptation of The Dark Tower.


Chapters include: Intro, Background (3:10), Heroes and Villains (32:50), The Director’s Chair (53:20), Page to Screen (1:06:00), The Score (1:10:20), King’s Dominion (1:15:20), Overall Thoughts (1:25:25), Bag of Bones (1:37:00), Outro (1:55:45). 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
